attributes.action: Give care workers a pay rise.
attributes.additional_details: Care workers work long hours and in stressful and dirty conditions. They have to pay up front for usage of petrol/diesel and have a hassle getting their money back. Delivery drivers and posties are on higher wages.
attributes.background: Improve the care service by supporting the care workers with a well deserved pay rise.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  Pay for carers employeed by individuals and private providers aren't the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591328
